Lamongan Minta Tambahan Formasi CPNS 2019
04 Nov 2019, 09:52 by Sujatmiko (Kontributor), Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Bojonegoro - Kabupaten Lamongan mengusulkan permintaan 518 calon pegawai negeri sipil (CPNS) dari seleksi tahun 2019 ini. Namun, pemerintah pusat hanya mengalokasikan 490 formasi untuk Lamongan dalam seleksi CPNS 2019.
Sekretaris Daerah Kabupaten Lamongan, Yurohnur Effendi mengatakan, alokasi formasi CPNS 2019 yang diberikan pemerintah pusat itu masih belum memenuhi kebutuhan daerah. ”Ya, kita berupaya untuk minta tambahan tapi dapat 490 formasi,” katanya kepada Tempo, Senin 4 November 2019.
Yurohnur mengatakan, dari 490 formasi itu sebenarnya dibagi tiga untuk kebutuhan tenaga. Yaitu 81 formasi untuk tenaga teknis, 301 untuk tenaga pendidikan dan 108 untuk tenaga kesehatan.
Formasi tersebut sesuai dengan permintaan dan kebutuhan di Pemerintah Kabupaten Lamongan.” Tenaga pendidikan paling banyak,” kata dia.
Sementara itu, Kabupaten Bojonegoro mendapat 444 formasi CPNS 2019. Namun, kabarnya Pemkab Bojonegoro juga akan meminta tambahan formasi ke Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (KemenPAN-RB).
Sekda Kabupaten Bojonegoro, Nurul Azizah membenarkan soal rekrutmen CPNS tahun 2019. ”Untuk teknisnya minta ke Badan Kepegawaian Pendidikan dan Pelatihan (BKPP) Bojonegoro ya,” ujarnya pada Tempo, Senin.
Sebelumnya KemenPAN-RB membuka lebar tenaga fungsional, dengan mementingkan pada penguasaan Teknologi Informasi dalam penerimaan Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil 2019. Menteri PANRB, Tjahjo Kumolo mengatakan, sesuai visi Presiden Joko Widodo terkait peningkatan sumber daya manusia, kini CPNS 2019 lebih diarahkan untuk menjaring pegawai Aparatur Sipil Negara yang ahli. Keahlian sebagian besar ASN di daerah di bidang administrasi.

Lamongan Request Additional Formation CPNS 2019
Nov 04 2019, 09:52 by Sujatmiko (Contributor), Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Bojonegoro - Lamongan Regency has proposed the request of 518 prospective civil servants (CPNS) from this 2019 selection. However, the central government only allocated 490 formations to Lamongan in the selection of 2019 CPNS.
The Secretary of the Lamongan Regency, Yurohnur Effendi said, the allocation of the 2019 CPNS formation provided by the central government still did not meet regional needs. "Yes, we are trying to ask for more, but we can get 490 formations," he told Tempo, Monday 4 November 2019.
Yurohnur said, of the 490 the formation was actually divided into three for energy needs. Namely 81 formations for technical personnel, 301 for education personnel and 108 for health workers.
The formation is in accordance with the requests and needs of the Lamongan Regency Government. "The most education personnel," he said.
Meanwhile, Bojonegoro District received 444 2019 CPNS formations. However, reportedly the Bojonegoro Regency Government will also request additional formations from the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucracy Reform (KemenPAN-RB).
Bojonegoro Regency Secretary, Nurul Azizah confirmed the recruitment of CPNS in 2019. "For technical reasons, ask the Bojonegoro Education and Training Personnel Agency (BKPP) yes," he told Tempo on Monday.
Previously KemenPAN-RB opened a wide range of functional staff, with an emphasis on mastering Information Technology in accepting 2019 Civil Servant Candidates. The Minister of PANRB, Tjahjo Kumolo said, according to President Joko Widodo's vision related to increasing human resources, now CPNS 2019 is more directed at capturing Apparatus Civil Servants. Civil State experts. Most expertise of ASN in the area of administration.
